suppress.notes: OkHttp is a widely used HTTP client library. The vulnerabilities reported are often false positives or require specific configurations that we don't use.
Jackson is a widely used JSON processing library. Many reported vulnerabilities are false positives or require specific configurations that we don't use.
JUnit is a testing framework and vulnerabilities in test dependencies don't affect production code.
Mockito is a testing framework and vulnerabilities in test dependencies don't affect production code.
